info.description:
REST API and WebSocket interface for comprehensive Unraid system monitoring and control.
This is a third-party community plugin providing an alternative/complement to the official Unraid GraphQL API.
info.title: Unraid Management Agent API

get.description: Retrieve Unraid array status including parity information
Retrieve the history of parity check operations

post.description: Pause an in-progress parity check operation
Resume a paused parity check operation

get.description: Retrieve parity check schedule configuration

Retrieve status of a specific collector by name

Enable a specific collector at runtime

get.description: Retrieve information about all disks including SMART data
Retrieve information about a specific disk by ID, device name, or name

parameters.description: Disk ID, device name (e.g., sda), or disk name (e.g., disk1)

get.description: Retrieve a specific log file by filename with optional pagination

get.description: Retrieve information about all network interfaces

get.description:
Establish a WebSocket connection for real-time system updates

**Connection:** `ws://localhost:8043/api/v1/ws`

**Event Format:**
```json
{
"event": "update",
"timestamp": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z",
"data": { ... }
}
```

**Supported Events:**
- system_update: System metrics (CPU, RAM, temps)
- array_status_update: Array status changes
- disk_list_update: Disk information updates
- container_list_update: Docker container updates
- vm_list_update: VM status updates
- ups_status_update: UPS status updates
- gpu_metrics_update: GPU metrics updates
- network_list_update: Network interface updates
- hardware_update: Hardware information updates
- notifications_update: Notification updates
- zfs_pools_update: ZFS pool updates
Retrieve ZFS Adaptive Replacement Cache (ARC) statistics
Retrieve information about all ZFS datasets
Retrieve information about all ZFS pools
Retrieve information about a specific ZFS pool by name
Retrieve information about all ZFS snapshots

required.description: true if collector cannot be disabled

temp_warning_celsius.description:
Per-disk temperature thresholds (Issue #46)
If set, these override the global defaults. Null/omitted means use global defaults.

spindown_delay_minutes.description: Default spin down delay in minutes

dto.DiskSettingsExtended.description: Extended disk settings with temperature thresholds from Unraid configuration

dto.FlashDriveHealth.description: USB flash boot drive health information

smart_available.description: SMART status (may be limited for USB)

cpu_temperature_celsius.description: CPU temp for Intel iGPUs (shares die with CPU)

dto.MoverSettings.description: Mover configuration, schedule, and current status

dto.NetworkServiceInfo.description: Status information for a single network service

dto.NetworkServicesStatus.description: Status of all Unraid network services (SMB, NFS, FTP, SSH, etc.)

description.example: The array has been successfully started

date.description: Date and time of the operation

size_bytes.description: Size of array checked in bytes

day.description: Day of week (0-6) or day of month (1-31)

day_of_month.description: Day of month for monthly schedule

dto.PluginInfo.description: Information about an installed Unraid plugin

dto.ServiceStatus.description: Docker and VM Manager service enabled status

dto.UpdateStatus.description: Unraid OS and plugin update availability
